content: place next 60 sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 10 sts for underarm knit to end 240 body sts 60 sts set aside for each sleeve size 3 place 60 sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 10 sts for underarm place new bor marker co another 10 sts for underarm knit 115 sts place next 60 sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 20 sts for underarm knit to end 270 body sts 60 sts set aside for each sleeve size 4 place 60 sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 10 sts for underarm place new bor marker co another 10 sts for underarm knit 125 sts place next 60 sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 20 sts for underarm knit to end 290 body sts 60 sts set aside for each sleeve size 5 place 70 sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 10 sts for underarm place new bor marker co another 10 sts for underarm *knit 26 sts m1 repeat from * 5 times place next 70 sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 20 sts for underarm *knit 26 sts m1 repeat from * 5 times 310 body sts 70 sts set aside for each sleeve size 6 place 70 sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 10 sts for underarm place new bor marker co another 10 sts for underarm k2tog knit 149 sts place next 70 sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 20 sts for underarm k2tog knit to end 340 body sts 70 sts set aside for each sleeve © sonder yarn co 2023 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only bobbles optional | page 6 size 7 place 80 sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 10 sts for underarm place new bor marker co another 10 sts for underarm knit 160 sts place next 80 sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 20 sts for underarm knit to end 360 body sts 80 sts set aside for each sleeve knit 57 57 59 59 59 59 63 rnds at this point you will have worked 112 112 126 126 140 140 154 rounds after neck ribbing not including short row sweater measures approximately 17 25 17 25 19 25 19 25 21 25 21 25 23 25 / 44 44 49 49 54 54 59 cm deep including neckline ribbing measured down center front you will also just have completed the last of seven stripes with cc if you wish to add length to the sweater continue alternating mc sections and stripes as set until desired length keeping in mind that the ribbed hem will add 2 / 5 cm please note that adding length will affect yardage requirements all sizes after the last stripe with cc switch to mc and knit 1 round before beginning ribbing work 1x1 twisted rib for 2 / 5 cm bind off
